feed.title: Solving CoinPool high-interactivity issue with cut-through update of Taproot leaves

entry.title: Solving CoinPool high-interactivity issue with cut-through update of Taproot leaves
entry.summary: Antoine receives a message from ZmnSCPxj, who asks if the term "OP_EVICT" is not appropriate for a certain purpose. The email does not provide any further details or context about what "OP_EVICT" refers to or the specific purpose in question. The email also includes a link to a web page on the Linux Foundation mailing list archive where Antoine can find more information.The email is brief and straightforward, with no additional content or questions. It is written in a professional tone and ends with ZmnSCPxj's signature and a mention of Proton Mail as the email service used.In summary, ZmnSCPxj reaches out to Antoine to inquire about the suitability of using "OP_EVICT" for an unknown purpose. The email lacks contextual information, but includes a link to a mailing list archive for further reference.
